I mean, if your definition of happiness is realizing the fantasy of throwing months or even years of love away by making your girlfriend have sex with another guy and slowly see her drift away from you, only to go on a trip with said guy and his friends, becoming more distant every day. Then your relationship with her is upgraded to you being on the other end of the phone every day as she has wild sex with countless guys and completely forgets about everything you two once had. If you're lucky, she'll even send pictures of her fun as she overwrites her memories of you with nothing but dick. Then you spend the rest of your days jerking off in a pool of sweat, tears and cum, enjoying the amazing feeling of being betrayed, replaced and topped by a superior man. If that's not the definition of happiness, then I don't know what is. Yep, being a cuckold is completely normal and healthy.

cucks: Hey can you fuck my gf for valentine
I don’t like ntr but I was very curious about why it was named “please have sex with my girlfriend” so I clicked on it and I gotta say, how much of a cuck do you have to be to like being cheated?

Unpopular opinion: I think this girl is actually a great girlfriend (so far). She tried something that she was uncomfortable with and she did the research for HIS BENIFIT. Most of you guys interoperate her enjoying  the sex with the guy, as her being a hoe. Let me ask you this? If a girl with bomb head skills was sucking you off, would it feel good? Odds are yes it would no matter if you have a SO, you may feel guilt, but what if your SO wants you to do it? Then any remaining guilt is from your own perception of being a good SO/making your partner happy. Selflessness is literally doing something for the benefit of someone else. Personally I really doubt there is something that is truly selfless since you get some sort of happiness from it (in this one she got her back blown out) but the reason why I said she is a good girlfriend is because she didn't lie about any of it (so far at least). She even told her BF about the Bull wanting to see her in secret and asked for his opinion.

This also doujins highlights how important psychosexual development is.  As an adolescent, during the genital stage, the MC experiences the girl he likes being kissed by a stronger, better (better in a physical sense) man.  In order to cope with his feelings of inadequacy at the realization that the girl wants someone "better" than him, he channels this into a sexual fetish. He acknowledges the fact that he is weaker and "lesser", and him wanting to see his girlfriend have sex with another man is a way of the MC punishing himself as a form of masochism, the primary form of masochism affording to Freud, so that his mind can have an easier time rationalizing it as a fetish rather than something deeper, about his insecurities overall
